title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Gauntlet of Shar Reward Dark Justiciar Helmet, Dark Justiciar Half-Plate, Spear of Night

Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic

Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic can be acquired during Act 2. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.
